metadata.topic_title: Business Impact Analysis for Software Dependencies

active_learning.discussion_prompt: In groups, debate the criticality of software dependencies in a hypothetical e-commerce platform. Categorize dependencies (e.g., payment gateway API vs. analytics library) and compare/contrast their business impacts during a cyber disruption. Use NIST CSF 'Identify' function to frame arguments.
